alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dutchess County through 600 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cold Spring, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beacon, Pawling, Pleasant Valley, Wappingers Falls, Fishkill, Hopewell Junction, Red Oaks Mill, Myers Corner, East Fishkill, Beekman, Stormville, Baker Corner, Knapps Corner, Hoxie Corner, New Hamburg, Glenham, Clove Valley, Poughquag, Billings and Pecksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
